# Loading the data 

To load data in, independently of the colonization scoring system, use the
follow command:

```{r loadData}
x <- readData("../inst/extdata/grid.csv") 
```

# Summarize data

```{r summary}
am_summary(x)
```

# Plot data

There are 2 plot types: 
- barplot
- boxplot

```{r plot}
am_plot(x, type = "barplot")
```
